verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיִקְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> that they bring לִ֖י תְּרוּמָ֑ה <S%H8641><s%> me an offering מֵאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> of every man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whose יִדְּבֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5068><s%> that giveth it willingly לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> with his heart תִּקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> ye shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּרוּמָתִֽי׃ <S%H8641><s%> my offering

וְזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise הַתְּרוּמָ֔ה <S%H8641><s%> And this [is] the offering אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> which ye shall take מֵאִתָּ֑ם <S%H853><s%> זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> of them gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> and brass

וּתְכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> And blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> and fine linen וְעִזִּֽים׃ <S%H5795><s%> and goats'

וְעֹרֹ֨ת <S%H5785><s%> skins אֵילִ֧ם <S%H352><s%> And rams' מְאָדָּמִ֛ים <S%H119><s%> dyed red וְעֹרֹ֥ת <S%H5785><s%> skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <S%H8476><s%> and badgers' וַעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּֽים׃ <S%H7848><s%> and shittim

שֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> Oil לַמָּאֹ֑ר <S%H3974><s%> for the light בְּשָׂמִים֙ <S%H1314><s%> spices לְשֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <S%H4888><s%> for anointing וְלִקְטֹ֖רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense הַסַּמִּֽים׃ <S%H5561><s%> and for sweet

אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> stones שֹׁ֕הַם <S%H7718><s%> Onyx וְאַבְנֵ֖י <S%H68><s%> and stones מִלֻּאִ֑ים <S%H4394><s%> to be set לָאֵפֹ֖ד <S%H646><s%> in the ephod וְלַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H2833><s%> and in the breastplate
וְעָ֥שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> And let them make לִ֖י מִקְדָּ֑שׁ <S%H4720><s%> me a sanctuary וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֖י <S%H7931><s%> that I may dwell בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> among

כְּכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> that אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I am מַרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> According to all that I shew אוֹתְךָ֔ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> תַּבְנִ֣ית <S%H8403><s%> thee [after] the pattern הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> תַּבְנִ֣ית <S%H8403><s%> and the pattern כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> of all the instruments וְכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so תַּעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> thereof even so shall ye make ס

וְעָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> And they shall make אֲר֖וֹן <S%H727><s%> an ark עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim אַמָּתַ֨יִם <S%H520><s%> two cubits וָחֵ֜צִי <S%H2677><s%> and a half אָרְכּ֗וֹ <S%H753><s%> [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֤ה <S%H520><s%> thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> and a half רָחְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7341><s%> the breadth וְאַמָּ֥ה <S%H520><s%> thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <S%H2677><s%> and a half קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> the height

וְצִפִּיתָ֤ <S%H6823><s%> And thou shalt overlay אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold טָה֔וֹר <S%H2889><s%> it with pure מִבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> within וּמִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> and without תְּצַפֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H6823><s%> shalt thou overlay וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ <S%H6213><s%> it and shalt make עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and זֵ֥ר <S%H2213><s%> upon it a crown זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וְיָצַ֣קְתָּ <S%H3332><s%> And thou shalt cast לּ֗וֹ אַרְבַּע֙ <S%H702><s%> four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <S%H2885><s%> rings זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ה <S%H5414><s%> for it and put עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> [them] in the four פַּעֲמֹתָ֑יו <S%H6471><s%> corners וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> thereof and two טַבָּעֹ֗ת <S%H2885><s%> rings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and צַלְעוֹ֙ <S%H6763><s%> side הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> [shall be] in the one וּשְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> of it and two טַבָּעֹ֔ת <S%H2885><s%> rings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and צַלְע֖וֹ <S%H6763><s%> side הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> in the other

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make בַדֵּ֖י <S%H905><s%> staves עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <S%H6823><s%> and overlay אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> them with gold

וְהֵבֵאתָ֤ <S%H935><s%> And thou shalt put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּדִּים֙ <S%H905><s%> the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <S%H2885><s%> into the rings עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on צַלְעֹ֣ת <S%H6763><s%> by the sides הָאָרֹ֑ן <S%H727><s%> of the ark לָשֵׂ֥את <S%H5375><s%> may be borne אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָרֹ֖ן <S%H727><s%> that the ark בָּהֶֽם׃

בְּטַבְּעֹת֙ <S%H2885><s%> in the rings הָאָרֹ֔ן <S%H727><s%> of the ark יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall be הַבַּדִּ֑ים <S%H905><s%> The staves לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָסֻ֖רוּ <S%H5493><s%> they shall not be taken מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וְנָתַתָּ֖ <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt put אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָרֹ֑ן <S%H727><s%> into the ark אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הָעֵדֻ֔ת <S%H5715><s%> the testimony אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> which I shall give אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make כַפֹּ֖רֶת <S%H3727><s%> a mercy seat זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold טָה֑וֹר <S%H2889><s%> [of] pure אַמָּתַ֤יִם <S%H520><s%> two cubits וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> and a half אָרְכָּ֔הּ <S%H753><s%> [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֥ה <S%H520><s%> thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <S%H2677><s%> and a half רָחְבָּֽהּ׃ <S%H7341><s%> the breadth

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> two כְּרֻבִ֖ים <S%H3742><s%> cherubims זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> [of] gold מִקְשָׁה֙ <S%H4749><s%> [of] beaten work תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מִשְּׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> them in the two קְצ֥וֹת <S%H7098><s%> ends הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <S%H3727><s%> of the mercy seat

וַ֠עֲשֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> And make כְּר֨וּב <S%H3742><s%> cherub אֶחָ֤ד <S%H259><s%> one מִקָּצָה֙ <S%H7098><s%> on the one end מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> on the other וּכְרוּב־ <S%H3742><s%> cherub אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> and the other מִקָּצָ֖ה <S%H7098><s%> end מִזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> one מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> with הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <S%H3727><s%> [even] of the mercy seat תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> shall ye make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכְּרֻבִ֖ים <S%H3742><s%> the cherubims עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> on the two קְצוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H7098><s%> ends

וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall have הַכְּרֻבִים֩ <S%H3742><s%> And the cherubims פֹּרְשֵׂ֨י <S%H6566><s%> shall stretch כְנָפַ֜יִם <S%H3671><s%> forth [their] wings לְמַ֗עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> on high סֹכְכִ֤ים <S%H5526><s%> covering בְּכַנְפֵיהֶם֙ <S%H3671><s%> with their wings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <S%H3727><s%> the mercy seat וּפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> and their faces אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [shall look] one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> are to be toward אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> to another אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> are to be toward הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <S%H3727><s%> toward the mercy seat יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall have פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> shall the faces הַכְּרֻבִֽים׃ <S%H3742><s%> of the cherubims

וְנָתַתָּ֧ <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <S%H3727><s%> the mercy seat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הָאָרֹ֖ן <S%H727><s%> upon the ark מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> above וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and הָ֣אָרֹ֔ן <S%H727><s%> and in the ark תִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> thou shalt put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣עֵדֻ֔ת <S%H5715><s%> the testimony אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> that I shall give אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְנוֹעַדְתִּ֣י <S%H3259><s%> And there I will meet לְךָ֮ שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> There וְדִבַּרְתִּ֨י <S%H1696><s%> with thee and I will commune אִתְּךָ֜ <S%H853><s%> מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> which [are] upon הַכַּפֹּ֗רֶת <S%H3727><s%> with thee from above the mercy seat מִבֵּין֙ <S%H996><s%> from between שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> the two הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> cherubims אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above אֲרֹ֣ן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָעֵדֻ֑ת <S%H5715><s%> of the testimony אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲצַוֶּ֛ה <S%H6680><s%> of all [things] which I will give thee in commandment אוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> Thou shalt also make שֻׁלְחָ֖ן <S%H7979><s%> a table עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim אַמָּתַ֤יִם <S%H520><s%> two cubits אָרְכּוֹ֙ <S%H753><s%> [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֣ה <S%H520><s%> thereof and a cubit רָחְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7341><s%> the breadth וְאַמָּ֥ה <S%H520><s%> thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <S%H2677><s%> and a half קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> the height

וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <S%H6823><s%> And thou shalt overlay אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold טָה֑וֹר <S%H2889><s%> it with pure וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and make לּ֛וֹ זֵ֥ר <S%H2213><s%> thereto a crown זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וְעָשִׂ֨יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make לּ֥וֹ מִסְגֶּ֛רֶת <S%H4526><s%> unto it a border טֹ֖פַח <S%H2948><s%> of an hand breadth סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and thou shalt make זֵר־ <S%H2213><s%> crown זָהָ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> a golden לְמִסְגַּרְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4526><s%> to the border סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> thereof round about

וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make לּ֔וֹ אַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> for it four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <S%H2885><s%> rings זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְנָתַתָּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <S%H2885><s%> the rings עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> in the four הַפֵּאֹ֔ת <S%H6285><s%> corners אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> that [are] on the four רַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> feet

לְעֻמַּת֙ <S%H5980><s%> Over against הַמִּסְגֶּ֔רֶת <S%H4526><s%> the border תִּהְיֶ֖יןָ <S%H1961><s%> become הַטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <S%H2885><s%> shall the rings לְבָתִּ֣ים <S%H1004><s%> be for places לְבַדִּ֔ים <S%H905><s%> of the staves לָשֵׂ֖את <S%H5375><s%> to bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֻּׁלְחָֽן׃ <S%H7979><s%> the table

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּדִּים֙ <S%H905><s%> the staves עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֔ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <S%H6823><s%> and overlay אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> them with gold וְנִשָּׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> may be borne בָ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֻּׁלְחָֽן׃ <S%H7979><s%> that the table
